Package hw1

Class LDLinkedList<E>

java.lang.Object
java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
java.util.AbstractList<E>
hw1.LDLinkedList<E>
Type Parameters:
E -
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<E>, java.util.Collection<E>, java.util.List<E>
public class LDLinkedList<E>
extends java.util.AbstractList<E>
Lazy Deletion Linked List has been re-implemented as desired in the assignment. I keep the nodes I removed in a linklist. The head of them is deletedHead. DeletedIter keeps the last added node.
Author:
berkan
